name: Narrate
description:
Install instructions

Download the zip file

Then double click the zip file to extract the files

Then open the application called "Narrate"

If you use a mac, you may need to right click the application then click "open"

If you use an operating system other than a mac, you may need to right click the application and click "extract files"

If once downloaded the application fails to open, please delete the zip file and reinstall.

Make sure you are connected to the internet

If you encounter an error page within the game, please click "Rollback"
